snippet.title: Histera - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Histera is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer shooter with a battlefield that changes on the fly: chunks of battlefield from past, present and future eras transform in real time!

Developed and published by @StickyLock 

Play the Histera demo for free during the Steam Next Fest from October 9th to October 19th.

Get the Histera demo here: https://bit.ly/3PqOHj0

Follow us on our socials to stay up to date:

Twitter / X: https://twitter.com/HisteraGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HisteraGame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/stickylock
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Histera/

#Histera #f2p #fps
